item.title: Starter Help!
item.dc:creator: @iaboni iaboni
item.description:
@iaboni wrote:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(955, 1000000);
addItem(1163, 1);
addItem(1079, 1);
addItem(1093, 1);
addItem(1127, 1);
addItem(1333, 1);
addItem(1201, 1);
addItem(1052, 1);
addItem(1305, 1);
addItem(1351, 1);
addItem(1265, 1);
addItem(391, 250);
addItem(6426, 200);
addItem(6428, 200);
addItem(6434, 200);
addItem(6436, 200);
addItem(6438, 200);
addItem(6424, 200);
addItem(560, 100);
addItem(565, 100);
addItem(562, 150);
addItem(556, 300);
sendMessage(“This is your Iaboniscape Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " You fckng Queer bag trying to have two starters, you’re G*Y");

        }
    }[/code]

I made a public int but I don’t really think I created the Int right all I did was add it to my client.java is their more i need to do?

Read full topic
